t: Lonely Planet Unpacked: Lonely Planet Publications, Wheeler, Tony: 9781864500622: Amazon.com: Books
s: Kailash is entertaining and its great to read about Kailash as a destination, but the disaster he experiences is what I call not very impressive. Lonely Planet should stick to updating their fine guidebooks more regulary instead of putting their brand on inferior stuff.
